tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_records (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    medical_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    record_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE medical_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    disease VARCHAR(100),
    diagnosis_date DATE,
    treatment VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_records(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    patient_age INT,
    patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
    patient_country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    record_date DATE,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(200),
    treatment VARCHAR(200),
    doctor_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender CHAR(1),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15) 
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    date_of_visit DATE,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    prescription VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    record_date DATE,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    treatment VARCHAR(255),
    doctor VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE health_stats (
    stats_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR(20),
    heart_rate INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE global_trends (
    trend_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    stats_id UUID REFERENCES health_stats(stats_id),
    country_id UUID REFERENCES countries(country_id),
    trend_type VARCHAR(50),
    trend_value INTEGER
);
